ygData.subject: From  The Mess Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She slammed the rest of her drink and stood up.  She immediately sat back down. She was just a little out of it. More like a lot out of it. She stood up

::KitKat::

She slammed the rest of her drink and stood up.  She immediately sat 
back down. She was just a little out of it. More like a lot out of it.
She stood up again and leaned on Drillbit. "OK, tomorwow iz a good 
time to start." she turned and looked at him. "You know, I just want 
to tell you that I weally appreaciate you helping me wid all tis."
She leaned over and kissed him, not on the cheek, but on the lips.  
She smiled, "Was it good for you too?"

(Please be aware she has had about a bottle of the liquid and is 
drunk and out of her mind)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit got up, and attempted to help KitKat stay up, and walking.
> "Oh, I'll help. Don't worry, we will begin in the morning. Now let 
me
> walk you to you're room." DrillBit said, motioning for them to 
leave the
> Mess Hall.
